info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 9:30AM EDT by NWS Cleveland OH
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio...
Maumee River At Waterville affecting Wood and Lucas Counties.
For the Maumee River...including Grand Rapids, Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Maumee River at Waterville.
* WHEN...From this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Floodwaters can back up through storm drains onto Water Street in Waterville making roads inaccessible.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this morning to 11.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall early Saturday morning. It will rise to 13.1 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/cle.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 730 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
